casebody.data:
No. 882,

Mise.

Comfort v. California. Lloyd Mc-Murray for petitioner. Thomas C. Lynch, Attorney General of California, Albert W. Harris; Jr., Assistant Attorney General, and Robert R. Granucci, Deputy Attorney General, for respondent.

Municipal Ct. of Oakland-Piedmont, Cal., and/or App. Dept., Super. Ct. Cal., County of Alameda. Certiorari denied.

Mr. Justice Douglas is of the opinion that certiorari should be granted. The Chief Justice took no part in the consideration or decision of this petition.
